headline: Wall Street is Bullish on Roper Technologies (ROP), Here’s Why?
summary: Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is one of the Top Large Cap Stocks to Buy At 52-Week Low. Wall Street has been bullish on Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) since the company topped revenue and EPS estimates during its fiscal second quarter of 2025. The company delivered $1.94 billion, up 13.21% year-over-year and ahead of the consensus […]

headline: IntelliTrans Expands TMS with Integrated CO₂ Emissions Dashboard, Powered by EcoTransIT World
summary: Shipment-level visibility gives bulk and break-bulk shippers audit-ready insights to simplify compliance and accelerate sustainability progress across truck, rail, and ocean freightATLANTA, Sept. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IntelliTrans, a leading global multimodal transportation management software provider, today announced the launch of a new CO2 Emissions Tracker within its transportation management system (TMS). headline: Transact IDX® Adds Mobile Credentials to Apple and Google Wallets, Alongside Additional Features
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., September 16, 2025--Transact + CBORD today announced a major update to Transact IDX®, its cloud-based campus transaction and credential system. Students can now add their campus ID directly to Apple and Google Wallets—eliminating the need for a separate app to access dorms, dining halls, libraries, and other services. This update also includes a variety of new Transact IDX® features for schools and students.
